item.description:
Wallyball is volleyball played indoors on a racquetball court.  It's a fun, fast-paced game where the walls of the court are part of the field of play. Wallyball is competitive but FUN! (Poor sportsmanship will be severely punished by Sheila.)  It's also a great workout that will improve cardio-vascular fitness and muscle tone.

If you can play volleyball, you can play wallyball.  It's indoors so weather is never a problem nor having to chase the wallyball down the beach.   

Games are every Thursday evening at Seacoast Sports Club on Greenleaf. 

Arrive 6:15 pm. Play generally will last until 9pm.

Wallyball is free for Seacoast Sports Club members,

$7 for non-members, payable at the desk. The $7 fee entitles you to full use of the locker rooms, pool, saunas, steam rooms, etc. for the evening, too.

RSVP EARLY in the week!! If we have a minimum of 8 signed up by Tuesday 9:00 am, a court will be reserved. Always check the meetup site prior to heading out for a game, as sometimes last minute changes in plans means we will have to cancel a game, an act severely frowned up by the Seacoast Sports Club. Unlike most other meetups, no shows are a HUGE problem for this one and will be severely punished by Sheila unless you can provide proof of death. I'm kidding but you get the point.
item.name: Wallyball 1/12/11
